/** * An adaptor method to return the aromaticity value of sequence. The sequence argument * must be a protein sequence consisting of only non-ambiguous characters. *

* Calculates the aromaticity value of a protein according to Lobry, 1994. * It is simply the relative frequency of Phe+Trp+Tyr. * * * * @param sequence a protein sequence consisting of non-ambiguous characters only * @return the aromaticity value of sequence */
